name: Sand Table: "Advance Demo"
description: A simple and practical sand table modeled after Grand Master Varka's.\n"While we hesitate, the Abyss is already claiming countless lives. The earlier we march, the sooner we can change their fates." Intelligence is the cornerstone of any operation or expedition. By simulating possible scenarios on the sand table in advance, the casualties caused by marches or battles should be greatly reduced...
